parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.82

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Difficulty

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Command allows suppressing visualization of FRIENDLY, ENEMY, MINES and/or PING map indicators from difficulty setting EXTENDED MAP CONTENT. 

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''disableMapIndicators''' [disableFriendly, disableEnemy, disableMines, disablePing]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> disableFriendly: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to disable visualization of friendly units
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> disableEnemy: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to disable visualization of enemy units
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> disableMines: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to disable visualization of mines
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> disablePing: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to disable visualization of all tactical pings

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Disable visualization of friendly and enemy units:<code>[[disableMapIndicators]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[true]], [[true]], [[false]], [[false]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[difficultyOption]]
</value></part></template></root>
